alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Clinton; Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 11:21PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Cedar, northwestern Scott and southwestern Clinton Counties through 1145 PM CST... At 1121 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bennett, or 7 miles north of Durant, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Donahue around 1135 PM CST. Long Grove and Grand Mound around 1140 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include DeWitt and McCausland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
